newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-BOOKMAKERS TRIM NEWCASTLE'S TITLE ODDS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-BOOKMAKERS TRIM NEWCASTLE'S TITLE ODDS.

text.p: Bookmakers Ladbrokes trimmed Newcastle's championship odds on Tuesday after the announcement that Kenny Dalglish is to be the club's new manager.
After Kevin Keegan resigned last week Newcastle were rated an 11-2 chance for the title, but they are now down to 9-2.
Ladbrokes spokesman Ian Wassell said: "If anyone can improve Kevin Keegan's team and take Newcastle on to championship glory it is Kenny Dalglish. His track record speaks for itself."
